author: mmusich
body:
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/29460

#### PR description:

Title says it all.

#### PR validation:

Tested wf 150.0: `runTheMatrix.py -l 150.0 -t 4 -j 8` in `CMSSW_11_1_X_2020-04-12-0000` with this branch which now runs to completion.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This PR is not a backport and no backport is meant.
Attn: @dmeuser @arossi83 @sroychow
title: Re-add SiPixelPhase1TrackResidualsAnalyzer to HI scenario
